lyrics: 泣かせて　怒らせて　ケンカして積みあげてきた恋雪降る今宵は　肩よせて全部　特別だね願い事を　きっと　叶えられる君だけのサンタクロースに　なりたいイヴさ(Merry Christmas)愛してるよ　Holy Night伝えきれぬ　この胸の想いを大好きだよ　Silent Night今夜だけは　素直になれそうさ　Christmas for youもつれて絡んで動けずにすれ違ってた日々幾つも　季節を乗り越えて恋は愛へと変わる染まりきった心　手のひら舞う妖精が白くやさしく　いやしてくれる(Merry Christmas)抱きしめたい　Holy Night両手いっぱい　あふれそうな幸せを離さないよ　Silent Nightいつも二人寄りそい　過ごしたい　Christmas for two(Merry Christmas)愛してるよ　Holy Night伝えきれぬ　この胸の想いを大好きだよ　Silent Night今夜だけは　素直になれそうさ　Christmas for you
translated_lyrics: ♫ I want you to be ♫ ♫ sobbing ♫ ♫ I want to be ♫ ♫ I want to be my shoulder ♫ ♫ I want to be my shoulder ♫ ♫ I want to be the only Santa Claus ♫ ♫ I want to be a Santa Claus ♫ ♫ I love you ♫ ♫ Silent Night, ♫ ♫ Silent Night. ♫ ♫ Silent Night, ♫ ♫ You know, ♫ ♫ Christmas for you ♫ ♫ You can't move ♫ ♫ You can't move ♫ ♫ You can't move ♫ ♫ There are a few days ♫ ♫　I want to hug a Merry Christmas, and I want to hold on to my love, and I want to hold on to you. (Merry Christmas) I want you to hold a clean, sweet, sweet, sweet, sweet, happy, happy life. Silent Night: Silent Night, I love you. I love you. I love you. I love you. I love you. I love you. I love you. I love this love of the heart.　Silent Night, tonight is the only way to be honest with you, Christmas for you.
